author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
RELIGION

Sri Hanumath Jayanthi Mahotsava Committee: Upanyasam by Bandarighere Madadesswar, Sri Raghavendra Swami Brindavanam, Sullivan Street, 6 a.m.

GENERAL

Avanashilingam University and Coimbatore Branch of SIRC of ICAI and SICASA: Seminar on ‘Comanies Act and taxation,’ 10 a.m.

Institute of Forest Genetics and Tree Breeding: Training programme on Biological Diversity Act 2002, 9.30 a.m.

RVS Technical Campus: Workshop, 9.15 a.m.

NGP Arts and Science College: Workshop on ‘Placement Readiness,’ Valluvar Arangam, 9.30 a.m.; workshop on ‘Mathematical Software – Advanced level,’ 9.30 a.m.; Communication Workshop by Computer Science Department, Kambar Arangam, 10 a.m.

Kovai Kalaimagal College of Arts and Science: Literary Fiesta, 10 a.m.

Nehru Group of Institutions: Entrepreneur awareness camp, Sudha Purushottaman of WOBEDA speaks, 9.30 a.m.

VLB Janakiammal College of Arts and Science: Programme on ‘Stock Market for Beginners,’ 10 a.m.

Angappa College of Arts and Science: Sports Day, 3 p.m.

Rathinam College of Arts and Science: Fashionista, 10.30 a.m.

Sri Jeyendra Saraswathi Maha Vidayalaya: Sessions on ‘Recent Trends in Financial Sector and Opportunities in Income Tax and TDS,’ 10 a.m. and 2 p.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
